title: Easily Deploy A Serverless CDN With Serverless Components

title: Wow Server Throttling
description: A key difference between private servers long ago and private servers today was the shear quantity of them. When I first started playing on private servers (Wrath was still early into its expansion cycle) there were not many options for a blizzlike server so the community was focused on only a few realms.
